title: 关于自定义怪物插件报错
author: sxw1427546525
txt_content:
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Skills.Mechanics.MessageSkill.<init>(MessageSkill.java:28)
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Skills.Skill.getSkillMechanic(Skill.java:395)
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.Mobs.MythicMob.<init>(MythicMob.java:301)
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.IO.Load.LoadMobs.LoadAllMobs(LoadMobs.java:35)
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.IO.Load.Configuration.LoadAll(Configuration.java:145)
        at net.elseland.xikage.MythicMobs.MythicMobs.onEnable(MythicMobs.java:165)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:321)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:340)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:405)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:356)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:316)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.s(MinecraftServer.java:408)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.k(MinecraftServer.java:372)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:327)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:267)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:560)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


玩家打怪的时候会报这种错误

replies.author: huane2008
replies.txt_content: 你的某个技能设置出错了。 你排查一下

replies.author: 尺寸
replies.txt_content: 可能是该版本的插件不兼容服务器版本

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content: 该怪物技能设置有问题
